data.eml:eml: On Powellithecidae fam. nov., a new Pliocene to Recent bryozoan family endemic to New Zealand, with the description of Powellitheca gen. nov. (Bryozoa, Cheilostomata)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Emanuela Di Martino, Paul D. Taylor, Dennis P. Gordon, Lee Hsiang Liow (2016): On Powellithecidae fam. nov., a new Pliocene to Recent bryozoan family endemic to New Zealand, with the description of Powellitheca gen. nov. (Bryozoa, Cheilostomata). European Journal of Taxonomy 207: 1-17, DOI: 10.5852/ejt.2016.207
